programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their “creature awareness” message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their “creature awareness” message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

Meanwhile, poor Micawber's claws are so long and he's so upset by getting them tangled up in things like Chris's scarf and the lighthouse tablecloth that he flies out of the window, carrying the tangled lighthouse keys in his claws! Chris tries to get them back and finds himself locked out of the lighthouse altogether! Luckily, Pat and Amy arrive in the SDS helicopter. programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Mangarap? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lisa (Vilma Santos) and Benny (Jay Ilagan) have found their match in each other. Unfortunately, Benny dies before they get married.

programme.title: Lumaban Ka... Sagot Kita
programme.desc: Linette (Cherie Pie Picache) is an active student leader. She is frustrated that her boyfriend Dado (Julio Diaz) is apathetic towards the situation. But this will soon change.

programme.title: Papunta Ka Pa Lang, Pabalik Na Ako
programme.desc: Gaston, a veteran police officer does not want Jojo, a rookie police asset, for his daughter. Jojo proves himself and he finds a sidekick in Jojo.

programme.title: Takot Ako Sa Darling Ko
programme.desc: It was love at first sight between Joey de Leon and Jenny Syquia but there was a big problem. She belonged to a family of vampires who had reformed and were now on their way to becoming normal human beings.

programme.title: Hatulan: Bilibid Boys 2
programme.desc: Bilibid Boys are young and daring but lost in a cruel society.

programme.title: A E I O U
programme.desc: Five misbegotten but witty kids survived this cold-hearted community.They found their hero in the person of Captain Juan,a funny but dedicated cop.

programme.title: Epimaco Velasco Story, NBI
programme.desc: FPJ took on the role of the country's modern day hero, Epimaco Velasco. Presented here were some of the best known among the many celebrated cases he solved and his private life as a devoted family man.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 25
programme.desc: At a Best Buy, Michael gets textually active with the world's thinnest disposable phone - and things grind to a halt when he reveals an app that makes coffee. Plus, Michael debuts a new beauty invention that turns ugly.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 26
programme.desc: While remodeling a home, Michael uncovers an explosive way to paint and silences a co-worker with a traveling squeak. Later, Michael takes scrapbooking to blinding speed, and a hospital becomes the scene of a mind-bending game of cops and robbers!

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 1
programme.desc: Eureka! We've found another 20 examples of modern innovations you just can't live without. We've got a belt for your booty, a robot that pours beer and an exciting new way to enjoy butter. Act now and we'll throw in our one of a kind cast, includingTodd Bridges, Jaimie Andrews, Brendon Walsh and John Enos.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 5
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke use the power of the sun to hack a juicy burger.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 1
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q pose as unreceptive receptionists in an office waiting room, then head to a wax museum where they mingle with the stiff crowd. And in the double punishment, the two losers are taken on a chopper ride from hell.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect Special: Trick Plays
programme.desc: Things get really heated in the bowling alley, hazards on the golf course come out of nowhere, and during a workout, Michael shows that dramatic transformations can happen in an instant.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect Special: Gadgets And Gizmos
programme.desc: From an electric removable eyeball to a 3D printing pen, this episode features the best reactions to Michael's most innovative creations.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Model Family

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Lisa Gaudenzi, fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: When Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A man is gunned down outside a local shop and authorities interrogate two of his acquaintances to find out which one of them pulled the trigger.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country: a man with a late-night urge to relieve himself picks an unusual spot to go; and more!

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)
programme.desc: An aspiring rapper is arrested after performing on top of a billboard. A man is caught licking the doorbell intercom of a home. A detained shoplifting suspect escapes her handcuffs and steals a police car.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Tim and Barbara Pasa meet at a gig Tim is performing at and quickly fall for one another. Barbara is a surgical nurse by day, a fun-loving party animal. They marry quickly, shocking their friends.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A woman faces life in prison when a passenger in the car she is driving is killed after she collides with an 18-wheel truck. Was she an intoxicated driver, or was it a tragic accident?

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Companion piece to the movie Black Girl Missing. While the media goes into a frenzy over missing white girls, Black women's disappearances receive muted coverage and limited police resources.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: Agent Dominick Polifrone poses as a mobster to stop the Iceman; Det. Carlos James goes undercover to thwart a plot against a woman's ex.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: On 9th June 2017, 26-year-old Chinese scholar Yingying Zhang is last seen getting into a car driven by Brendt Christensen, who had been trying to lure women. Yingying is never seen again.

programme.desc: In Tonopah, Nevada, ghost hunters make contact with spirits in a haunted Clown Motel. A UFO flies above Fort Knox. A cryptid peers into a Louisiana man's backyard night after night.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: 9-year-old Kamryn Johnson is supposed to be at gymnastics class when her mother, Sheraton, receives a frantic phone call saying Kamryn is being held captive for ransom.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A father attacks his son's killer in court; a defendant drops the f-bomb during a virtual hearing; a man convicted of child abuse lashes out at the judge; and more.

programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Les Belges Du Bout Du Monde
programme.desc: After working in several countries in Africa, it is finally in Ivory Coast that Patricia Ekaba puts down her suitcases. Director of communication but also a novelist, she is passionate about architecture, fashion, design and Nollywoodian cinema. She makes Adrien discover a face sometimes unknown on his continent.

programme.title: Bleu Ocean
programme.desc: Since 2003, a sustainable aquaculture program in French Polynesia has helped popularize the paraha peue, a rare and refined lagoon fish. Once reserved for the luckiest fishermen, it is now available in stores and served in restaurants.

programme.title: Les Mots De La Paix
programme.desc: Crises, coups, wars, transnational threats, outside interference, global warming: the stability of Africa and the safety of the civil populations are in danger. Via twenty words, the political scientist Niagale Bagayoko analyses the current security challenges and dynamics.
